reviews.review: Jogo quebrado, com comunidade doente, compra nÃ£o, tu vai gostar no inicio e sÃ³ vai virar estresse dps, confia.

was fun then the mmr changes happened and it ruined the game. killers get rewarded for tunneling people out of game and camping hooks. if you want high mmr aka non dumb teammates you need to play for yourself. game is a "team game" but you only get punished for playing that way unless you're playing with someone else.

devs are smooth brains and don't listen to the community about anything really anymore and dont care for player base other then new people coming in so they can milk the whales. 

If you want to pick this game up i can say for sure that i don't recommend this at all and i'm saddened by the fact that the devs are such blockheads and refuse to make the game a actual good experience not just for the new people but for the people that have been playing this game for a long time

Unbalanced, buggy game. All the unbalance is caused by donation hunters that you can't fucking win. They run faster, they see you through walls, they shoot you through textures, they always know and see where you're hiding. And the game doesn't give a shit whether you're a newbie or not, you're gonna get thrown to the pros who are already level 100.

I don't recommend it at all. paying for the game you do not get no one fun because of PAY TO WIN

The game has become trash with the new MMR system, they promised balanced matches and all we got is toxic tryharders in our matches ruining our experience. The game has a very bad community (check my profile and read the comments). I don't have fun playing this game anymore 
RIP. Unistalled.
The game is very good but you will want to take your eyeballs out with a fork after playing a few rounds

It is a very good game because you have two choices to pick from you can be a killer or a survivor. When you are the killer your objective is to kill the survivors before they escape. When you are the survivor you have to complete 5 gens and avoid getting killed. It takes 3 hooks to kill you. Each killer has a different ability. The killer can have addons to there special ability. While survivors can take items with them. Everyone has perks that can help them in game. Every person has 3 perks that only they have until you reach to level 30 35 40 then you teachables. The teachables are now used in everyones blood web (which is how you level up with blood points you get after a match). If you are the last survivor remaining you can escape through the hatch but the killer can close if they find it before you. If they do close it you can try opening the gates but the killer will watch over them so be careful.

i wouldn't recommend the game just for the community, one of the more toxic and blind i have ever seen, i would compare it with the LOL one. The end game chat is a huge show of ignorance and lack of self consciousness. People that decide to ruin everybody game before it even starts, a fuck tonne of D/C just because they make a mistake and blame on the others, killer that camp and tunnel just because a player is better and they feel insulted. On the other side the game itself is incredibly good even if unbalanced (it's incredibly hard to balace in my opinion), a little repetitive but not even so much. Overall the best way to play this game is skipping every end-game chat and accept that out of 10 games you'll really play 5/6 of them. This is just my experience and absolutely not objective

This game is pretty dumb. all you do is run and escape a killer, theres no way to fight back which is stupid. They also keep releasing Dlcs that you have to purchase. This game is complete garbage. I own it and maybe have an hour total on it. If i could get a refund i would.

the game is fun but there are no players so you still need to wait for more than 20-30 minutes for the queue. I guess people got tired of the game and just moved on :(
Nice game to play with friends

This game is trash i keep getting "you disconnected from the host error" even i have a stable internet and i keep getting banned from the matches for no reason because of that.I said that to the support and they just igroned my problem.This game has so many gliches too ,ridicilous hitboxes and etc.

sehr cooles Spiel macht spaÃŸ, aber manchmal gibt es wirklich zu gute spieler.
English: A very cool game, it makes fun, but sometimes there a too good players.

Nach 1000 Stunden DBD wird es auch mal  Zeit eine Bewertung abzugeben :D
DBD ist ein "Horror" Survival Game was vor allem mit Freunden sehr viel SpaÃŸ macht.
Viel "Horror" ist es dennoch nicht wirklich, natÃ¼rlich gibt es hier und da mal ein paar Schreck-Momente aber das war's auch.
Die Survivor- so wie die Killer Rolle macht sehr viel SpaÃŸ, auch wenn man manchmal gerne durch's Fenster springen mÃ¶chte.
Selbst wenn man langsam weiÃŸ, wie man gegen welchen Killer spielt, wird es nicht langweilig. 
Das einzige wirklich negative an DBD ist das Matchup-System. Teilweise hat man Runden mit neuen Spieler die selbstverstÃ¤ndlich nicht so viel Ahnung haben wie die, die seit lÃ¤ngerem dabei sind. 
Meiner Meinung nach lohnt es sich sehr das Spiel zu kaufen, vor allem wenn man Freunde hat die das mit einem aktiv spielen. 
Und selbst wenn man niemanden hat mit dem man zusammen spielen kann, die Killer Rolle gibt auch viele MÃ¶glichkeiten her. Solange man die Ruhe bewahrt lÃ¤uft alles gut :)
